trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of child controls in a table layout container.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de controles filho em um contêiner de layout de tabela.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> class represents the collection of all the child controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> classe representa a coleção de todos os controles filho em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle.

trans-unit.source: This collection is exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Essa coleção é exposta pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can manage and individually manipulate members of the table layout panel through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> exposed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode gerenciar e manipular individualmente os membros do painel de layout de tabela por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> exposto pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> class is a minor specialization of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> base class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> classe é uma especialização secundária do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> classe base.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control that contains the control collection.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> que contém a coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Generally, the application programmer will not directly create instances of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, o programador de aplicativo não diretamente criará instâncias de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: Instead, a reference to an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, uma referência a um existente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> é retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The control to add.
trans-unit.target: O controle a se adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The column in which <c>control</c> will be placed.
trans-unit.target: A coluna na qual <c>control</c> será colocado.

trans-unit.source: The row in which <c>control</c> will be placed.
trans-unit.target: A linha na qual <c>control</c> será colocado.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified control to the collection and positions it at the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o controle especificado à coleção e o posiciona na célula especificada.

trans-unit.source: With <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.Add%2A>, you can specify the cell position of `control`.
trans-unit.target: Com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.Add%2A>, você pode especificar a posição da célula de `control`.

trans-unit.source: You can assign `control` to a specific cell by providing both the `column` and `row` parameters, or you can specify only the column or row value and let the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> place `control` at the next open cell.
trans-unit.target: Você pode atribuir `control` a uma célula específica, fornecendo ambos o `column` e `row` parâmetros, ou você pode especificar somente o valor de coluna ou linha e permitir que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> colocar `control` na próxima célula aberta.

trans-unit.source: This is known as letting the control *flow* to its position in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Isso é conhecido como permitir que o controle *fluxo* para sua posição no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle.

trans-unit.source: Set `column` to -1 if you want `control` to occupy a fixed row position.
trans-unit.target: Definir `column` como -1 se você quiser `control` ocupar uma posição de linha fixa.

trans-unit.source: Set `row` to -1 if you want `control` to occupy a fixed column position.
trans-unit.target: Definir `row` como -1 se você quiser `control` ocupar uma posição de coluna fixa.

trans-unit.source: If neither `column` nor `row` is -1, `control` will be added at the absolute position given by (`column`, `row`).
trans-unit.target: Se nem `column` nem `row` é -1, `control` será adicionado na posição absoluta fornecida pelo (`column`, `row`).

trans-unit.source: If you set both `column` and `row` to -1, `control` will flow to the first open position, with the specific flow behavior defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir ambos `column` e `row` como -1, `control` fluirá para a primeira posição aberta, com o comportamento específico de fluxo definido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valor.

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Isso é equivalente a usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: To get to the actual current position of a control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter a posição atual real de um controle, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: This method takes into account the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control state, including column or row spanning and when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> has placed a control with its `Column` and `Row` properties set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Esse método leva em conta todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> estado de controle, incluindo a coluna ou linha abrangência e quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> colocou um controle com seu `Column` e `Row` propriedades definidas como -1.

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="column" /> or <paramref name="row" /> is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="column" /> ou <paramref name="row" /> é menor que -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> that contains the controls in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o pai <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> que contém os controles na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> that contains the controls in the current collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> que contém os controles na coleção atual.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.%23ctor%2A> construtor.
